materials.name: Tris-HCl Buffer (1M, pH 8.0)
materials.description: pH 8.0 buffer used in DNA, RNA, and protein protocols.

materials.name: 1.5 mL Microcentrifuge Tubes
materials.description: Disposable tubes for sample prep, centrifugation, and storage.

materials.name: Human Plasma (Frozen)
materials.description: Frozen human plasma used for research and diagnostic applications.

materials.name: Vortex Mixer
materials.description: Benchtop device for rapid mixing of liquid samples in tubes.

materials.name: Agarose Powder
materials.description: Dry powder used to prepare agarose gels for nucleic acid electrophoresis.
